message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value item. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a serious offer. I'm looking for $25000 for the product.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $15000 for the product. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower than this.

I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell at $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $20000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and what I'm looking to get out of it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $18000 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually agreeable price.

I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $22000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I'm open to further discussion if you're willing to meet me at this price.
I understand you're trying to get a fair price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $18000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
